suppress.notes: file name: xercesImpl-2.12.2.jar CVE-2017-10355 is around java web start, and not explicitly xercesImpl; the sonatype reference isn't clear either. Since xerces is used to run transforms, and that functionality is required, we suppress.
We don't use snakeyaml directly so we can't switch to using SafeConstructor It's usually done by jackson, so we have to wait on them to resolve
file name: jackson-databind-2.13.4.jar, will be resolved in 2.14.0
